section.title: billing controlling quantity for Approve Billing Quantity
section.para: To specify billing quantities for line items in the Approve Order for Billing screen, double-click on a line item in the Line Items displayâ€”or highlight the line item and select the EDIT SELECTION button. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Approve Billing Quantity for Line Item

section.para: When approving the billing quantity for a line item, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Displays sales order line item number.
Displays item number of line item.
Displays remaining quantity to be shipped.
Enter the quantity you want to approve for billing.
Select to close the specified line item after billing.

tip.para: If you are shipping a partial quantity to a customer, be sure to leave the Close this Line After Billing option unchecked. This will ensure the sales order item remains open until the full quantity has been shipped.

listitem.para: Select the tax type to be applied from the drop down list.
